name: Catch the stars! (Morgan von Brylan)
description:
Oh no! Vincent van Gogh was working on his new painting, The Starry Night, but he lost all the stars! Help him get them back!

In this rythm game, stars will appear synced with a beat, then you will have to click on them in order, following the beat as well.

Your progress is saved in your browser's cookies.

Credits to Bloons the Cat for the art!


Challenges completed:

  • Make all your own sound effects using only sounds you can make with your mouth.
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
